solution_line_template: Lara gave {mom_flowers} + {more_for_grandma} = <<{mom_flowers}+{more_for_grandma}={grandma_flowers}>>{grandma_flowers} stems of flowers to her grandma.
She gave away {grandma_flowers} + {mom_flowers} = <<{grandma_flowers}+{mom_flowers}={total_given_away}>>{total_given_away} stems of flowers.
Therefore, Lara put {total_bought} - {total_given_away} = <<{total_bought}-{total_given_away}={in_vase}>>{in_vase} stems of flowers in the vase.
